param.name: debug
param.label: Debug
param.description: Turn this on to provide more debug information in the case of an invalid response.

param.name: replace_escaped_chars
param.label: Replace Escaped Characters
param.description: Turn this on if you are experiencing issues saving items from JAM. This will replace any escaped characters using the name convention with the number convention.

param.name: exit_after_executing
param.label: Exit After Executing
param.description: Turn this on if you are receiving an HTML response in the JAM application. This will exit before returning to Joomla! after executing to avoid any system plugins from injecting HTML into the response.

param.name: detach_nonjoomla_user_plugins
param.label: Detach non-Joomla User Plugins
param.description: Turning this setting on will disable any non-Joomla user plugins. This has been required with a 3rd party user plugin is installed that redirects the user on logout.

param.name: force_output_buffering
param.label: Force Output Buffering
param.description: Turning this setting on will force the component to use ob_start and ob_get_flush to retrieve and trim the XMLRPC output. This will fix some issues caused by having PHP Output Buffering turned on.
